system.notes: If ever overloads, attack responsible for overload takes 2d10 Energy Damage reduced by their Willpower Bonus rather than Toughness or Armour. Only Functions when wearer has the Mark of Tzeentch

description.value: If ever overloads, attack responsible for overload takes 2d10 Energy Damage reduced by their Willpower Bonus rather than Toughness or Armour. Only Functions when wearer has the Mark of Tzeentch
